title: Design, synthesis and computational studies of new azaheterocyclic coumarin derivatives as anti-Mycobacterium tuberculosis agents targeting enoyl acyl carrier protein reductase (InhA)
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21763-21777
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02746A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Rasha Z. Batran, Ahmed Sabt, Jarosław Dziadek, Asmaa F. Kassem
New series of coumarin derivatives were synthesized as antitubercular agents targeting InhA enzyme with strong binding affinity within the active binding site.
